Package assignment6.chatRoomApp

Class ServerMessageHandler

java.lang.Object
assignment6.chatRoomApp.ServerMessageHandler
public class ServerMessageHandler extends Object
Represents the message handler in server side containing the protocol handler and the map of current active clients.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ServerMessageHandler()
    Create a server message handler, and initialize the protocol handler and the map of current active clients

  • Method Details

    • process

      public boolean process(int messageIdentifier, DataInputStream dataInputStream, DataOutputStream dataOutputStream)
      Process the message frame data from the client side based on the message type. After processing, return the result message frame data to specified clients
      Parameters:
      messageIdentifier - the message type
      dataInputStream - the data input stream
      dataOutputStream - the data output stream
      Returns:
      true if the connection is alive

    • removeClientInformation

      public void removeClientInformation(DataOutputStream dataOutputStream)
      This method helps to remove the client related information from server side, if client terminates without properly communicating with server
      Parameters:
      dataOutputStream - data output stream

    • getActiveClientMap

      public Map<String,DataOutputStream> getActiveClientMap()
      Get the map of current active clients
      Returns:
      the map of current active clients
